Package projetofinalpoo

Class Book

java.lang.Object
projetofinalpoo.Publication
projetofinalpoo.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Publication>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BookChapter, ConferenceArticleBook
public class Book
extends Publication
A Book is a child object of a Publication so it inherits its methods and variables. A Book is represented by its publisher and its ISBN and all the values inherited from the Publication class. A ISBN is a code that identifies a book. A publisher is the entity that publishes the book.
See Also:
Publication, Serialized Form

    • Book

      public Book()

    • Book

      public Book​(java.lang.String title, java.util.List<Researcher> author, java.lang.String summary, java.util.List<java.lang.String> keywords, int publicationYear, int audience, java.lang.String publisher, java.lang.String isbn)
      Constructor that initializes the Book and Publications value (title, author, summary, keywords, publicationYear, audience, publisher and isbn)
      Parameters:
      title - name of the title
      author - List of Researcher objects that made this Book
      summary - description of this Book
      keywords - List of Strings that describe this Book
      publicationYear - year that this Book was published
      audience - quantity of people to which this Book was shown to
      publisher - name of the publisher of the book, the entity that published the book
      isbn - the identifying code of a book
      See Also:
      Publication

      public void setPublisher​(java.lang.String publisher)
      This method alters the name of this Book object's publisher. A publisher is the entity that published the book to the public.
      Parameters:

    • getIsbn

      public java.lang.String getIsbn()
      This method returns the current value of the ISBN of this book.
      Returns:
      a String that represents the Book's ISBN, a code that identifies the Book object.

    • setIsbn

      public void setIsbn​(java.lang.String isbn)
      This method alters the code of the ISBN of this Book object. A ISBN is a String that identifies a book.
      Parameters:
      isbn - String that will be the book's new ISBN

      impactFactorCalculator in class Publication
      Returns:

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Method that describes the characteristics of a Book. It returns a string in the following format:

      Title : __, Summary : __, Type : __

      Keywords : __

      Authors : __, Publication Year : __

      Publisher : __, ISBN : __

      Note: __ is the place where the values are going to appear (they change object to object)

      Overrides:
      toString in class Publication
      Returns:
      a String that describes a Book object
